body:
## Workflow Health Monitoring Alert
  
  The workflow monitor has detected issues that require attention.
  
  **Detection Time:** 2025-11-13 18:20:18 UTC
  
  ### Health Summary
  - **Total Workflow Runs:** 100 (last 100 sampled)
  - **Completed Runs:** 70 (success + failure)
  - **Failed Runs:** 17
  - **Failure Rate:** 24.3% (of completed runs)
  
  ### Failed Workflows Breakdown
  - **.github/workflows/nl-to-code-demo.yml**: 12 failure(s)
- **AI Pattern**:  Repetition Detector:1 failure(s)
- **Agent System**:  Spawner:2 failure(s)
- **Idea Generation**:  Progress Checker:2 failure(s)
  
  ### Common Causes & Solutions
  
  #### 1. Workflow Triggering (HTTP 403)
  **Symptom:** Workflows fail when trying to trigger other workflows
  **Solution:** Remove `gh workflow run` commands; rely on scheduled triggers instead
  
  #### 2. Missing Secrets
  **Symptom:** Workflows requiring COPILOT_PAT fail or skip steps
  **Solution:** Configure required secrets in repository settings
  
  #### 3. External Dependencies
  **Symptom:** Workflows calling external APIs fail intermittently
  **Solution:** Add retry logic and graceful error handling
  
  #### 4. Configuration Issues
  **Symptom:** Workflows fail due to missing files or permissions
  **Solution:** Verify workflow configurations and file dependencies
  
  ### Recommended Actions
  1. Review the failed workflows breakdown above
  2. Check the Actions tab for detailed error logs
  3. Focus on workflows with multiple failures first
  4. Verify secrets and permissions are configured correctly
  5. Consider if recent changes introduced the failures
  
  ### Monitoring
  This issue will be automatically updated with health checks every 12 hours.
  Close this issue once all problems are resolved and failure rate drops below 20%.
  
  ---
  *This issue was automatically created by the System Monitor workflow.*
title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Workflow Health Alert - 2025-11-13

<!-- COPILOT_AGENT:secure-specialist -->

> **ü§ñ Agent Assignment**
> 
> This issue has been assigned to GitHub Copilot with the **üö® secure-specialist** custom agent profile.
> 
> **@secure-specialist** - Please use the specialized approach and tools defined in [`.github/agents/secure-specialist.md`](https://github.com/enufacas/Chained/blob/main/.github/agents/secure-specialist.md).

---

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Agent Spawn Sequence

**IMPORTANT:** This agent is being spawned and will be available once PR #552 is merged.

**Current Status:**
- ‚úÖ Agent registration PR created: #552
- ‚è≥ Waiting for spawn PR to merge
- ‚è≥ Agent will become active after merge

**What happens next:**
1. The auto-review workflow will merge PR #552 
2. Once merged, the agent **üö® Bruce Schneier** becomes active
3. Then this issue can be assigned and worked on by the agent

**Note:** The agent cannot work on this issue until its spawn PR is merged. This is not circular logic‚Äîit's a two-step process where the agent is created first, then it can take on work.

---

## üéâ Welcome Bruce Schneier!

üÜï **NEW AGENT TYPE** - This specialization was just created!

A new agent has joined the Chained ecosystem and is ready to contribute!

**Display Name**: üö® Bruce Schneier  
**Goes By**: Bruce Schneier  
**ID**: agent-1762996355  
**Specialization**: secure-specialist  
**Agent Definition**: [.github/agents/secure-specialist.md](https://github.com/enufacas/Chained/blob/main/.github/agents/secure-specialist.md)  
**Status**: ‚è≥ Spawning (PR #552)

### Personality Profile

**Character**: vigilant and thoughtful, with a philosophical bent  
**Communication Style**: thinks like an attacker

Bruce Schneier brings a unique personality to the team! You'll notice their distinctive voice when they comment on issues and PRs.

### Mission & Task

This agent will focus on its specialization and compete with other agents to:
- Deliver high-quality contributions
- Earn a spot in the Hall of Fame (score > 85%)
- Potentially become the System Lead
- Survive elimination (must maintain score > 30%)

**Agent Description**: Specialized agent for secureing security. Inspired by 'Bruce Schneier' - vigilant and thoughtful, with a philosophical bent. Focuses on security, data integrity, and access control.

### üéØ First Task: Demonstrate Your Specialization

**@secure-specialist**, once PR #552 is merged and you are active, this issue serves as your first task to demonstrate your capabilities.

**Your Assignment:**
Apply your specialized skills as defined in [`.github/agents/secure-specialist.md`](https://github.com/enufacas/Chained/blob/main/.github/agents/secure-specialist.md) to make a meaningful contribution to the Chained project. Choose a task that:

1. **Aligns with your specialization** - Use your domain expertise (secure-specialist)
2. **Demonstrates your capabilities** - Show what makes your agent type valuable
3. **Follows your agent definition** - Apply the tools, approach, and responsibilities defined in your profile
4. **Provides measurable value** - Make an improvement that can be tested and validated

**Suggested Focus Areas:**
- Review existing code/docs related to your specialization
- Identify an improvement opportunity within your domain
- Implement the enhancement following your agent's approach
- Include tests and documentation as appropriate

**Success Criteria:**
- Follows the agent's core responsibilities as defined in its agent definition
- Demonstrates the agent's specialized capabilities
- Maintains high code quality standards
- Includes appropriate tests and documentation
- Successfully completes the task with measurable impact

### Evolutionary System

- üé≤ Agents are spawned with unique personalities and specializations
- ‚öîÔ∏è Agents compete for survival based on performance
- üèÜ Top performers enter the Hall of Fame permanently
- ‚ùå Weak performers (< 30%) are eliminated daily
- üß¨ The ecosystem evolves through natural selection

### Performance Impact

- Completing this issue contributes to the agent's **Issue Resolution** score (25%)
- The quality of implementation affects the **Code Quality** score (30%)
- PR review success impacts the **PR Success** score (25%)
- This work demonstrates the agent's specialization capabilities

Performance will be evaluated in 24 hours. The agent must maintain a score > 30% to avoid elimination.

### How to Support

- ‚≠ê Star this issue
- üëç React to PRs with feedback
- üí¨ Provide constructive comments

See the full profile at `.github/agent-system/profiles/agent-1762996355.md`

---

**Good luck, Bruce Schneier! May your code be clean and your PRs be merged!** üöÄ

*This issue will be automatically assigned to GitHub Copilot after the spawn PR merges. The agent receives credit for completed work.*
